ValidationRule.description: Ensure that the referral has been approved before assignments are made.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( Referral__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Civil_Litigation_Referral' || Referral__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Request_for_Legal_Court_Action' || Referral__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Request_for_Legal_Services' ) && ( ISPICKVAL ( Referral__r.Request_Status__c , 'Pending Approval' ) || ISPICKVAL ( Referral__r.Request_Status__c , 'Denied' ) || ISPICKVAL ( Referral__r.Request_Status__c , 'Closed' ) ) && ( ISNEW() || ( Currently_Assigned__c && !PRIORVALUE( Currently_Assigned__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please approve the referral before assigning to an attorney. A referral must also be active in order to be assigned.
